website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to keep piloting your drone during hot, sunny days when it is difficult to see the screen.
pros: The three-quarters wraparound sheet of thin metal fits most 8-inch screen devices for sun protection
The sun shield keeps the sunlight off the screen, reducing glare
cons: Smart devices must have an 8-inch screen
Some screen shapes may not be compatible

customer_reviews.title: It works but requires some effort. The Velcro for ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but requires some effort. The Velcro for the sides doesn't line up well and doesn't hold together very well. However it is the right size for a small tablet or can be cut out slightly for use with large cell phone. Upgraded review to 4 stars due to the exceptional customer service I received from Powerextra ( Thank You Zoe). Will update with photos soon to show the modifications I have done to make this a great sun shade for your DJI remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Geek

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my iPad....
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT purchase this. It does not fit well when mounted on the controller. I actually returned it for a refund and got different style. During the first testing of the sunshade...it dropped my iPad!
customer_reviews.author: W.Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Remote's clamp doesn't grip it well
customer_reviews.text: The remote's clamp doesn't grip the bottom of the shade very well. It would be easy for the manufacturer to fix that problem. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: daveroller

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: No issues, works well. You have to be careful about iPad minis overheating in the summer (or year-round in south florida) and loosing video feed. But for what it was designed for, no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: Good shade for iPad mini2 without a case.
customer_reviews.text: I like this idea for my iPad mini2, but I guessed that it would work with my Lifeproof case. It doesn't quite open wide enough, so I had to slightly modify the lower sides and add some hook and loop fasteners to make it work. No fault of the original design, I was just asking too much of it.
customer_reviews.author: lightbg

customer_reviews.title: Same size of DJI Stock Sunshine. Lower cost version of it.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for this sunshade to be bigger than the DJI stock sunshade. It is not larger but the same size. An Samsung Tab A8 is just too big for it. If you are looking for a lower cost version of the DJI stock sunshade, this is what you want, If you are looking for something larger, to fit larger tablets, look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should but is heavy. Makes the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should but is heavy. Makes the holder tilt quite a bit and have to adjust it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: kuntri

customer_reviews.title: ... is just a tad small for it would work great with a Galaxy A6
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Galaxy A8 and this sun screen is just a tad small for it would work great with a Galaxy A6. I was able to make it work but would recommend the next size up. As they said it would work with the A8 I give it only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: You Need This If You Fly Drones.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job perfectly - makes using the ipad on a sunny day a breeze. Fits in the DJI case as well. A MUST have.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kinniburgh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't fit my galaxy tab a . Seems just a little small for my tablet
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit my iPad holder I’m using on the spark controller
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work with the clip-on iPad holder for my Spark, suction cups don’t hold the iPad. I’ll give it to someone who really needs one but I won’t be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect solution for my ipad mini. Love the look very sturdy. Folds up neat and clean for transport.
customer_reviews.author: John Mark Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, High Quality Visor. Very necessary for to see the ipad mini screen.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Forster

customer_reviews.title: The suction cups don't work too good with my iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. The suction cups don't work too good with my iPad mini. It needs to be squished down real hard to make it stick.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E Fields

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my 8" Lenovo.  Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this hood as it did not fit my 8" Lenovo Tablet
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

customer_reviews.title: Product ok but had to be returned because it did not fit my tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Product was no good for my tablet, size & description not great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Shade
customer_reviews.text: Fit my i-pad mini without a case perfectly. Did it's job as a sun shade as expected. Takes a little adjusting, but overall a good sunshade.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality control
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality control. Already returned one due to poor quality in material, and heavily flawed stitching. Second one is working so far. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Austin D.

customer_reviews.title: fits good and serves a bit of a purpose for the ...
customer_reviews.text: fits good and serves a bit of a purpose for the price but still get reflections from below and from myself....a black shirt helps. I've seen others the shade the bottom as well. May try that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fitz

customer_reviews.title: better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, better than nothing. Screens on iPads still too dim for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scalisi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pain in the a## but definitely needed in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Cory R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Suction pads don't work on all types of surfaces. Otherwise, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and folds thin for travel. Well designed. Great product & price.
customer_reviews.author: John A Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Works good and is convienuent
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my iPad mini 2. Folds flat so it's easy to store and transport.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups worthless...howwver the product with modification can be made to fit and work well
customer_reviews.author: montana

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has magnets that hold it together and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn I.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't quite fut my Tablet, but I can stretch it...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have an att trek 2 8 inch tablet and this had to be made to fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit for nexus 13 tablet,also samsung 8 inch tablets
customer_reviews.author: kenneth henson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, the cable hole is a bit misplaced, but works!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L. Forero

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This a great sunshade for my iPad mini. Easy to assemble and store in my case. Delivery was prompt and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Seller/Product, Even Though Things Didn't Work Out.
customer_reviews.text: I would just like to extend my thanks to the seller for trying their best to come up with a solution to fit this sunshade to my Samsung Tab 4. In the end, the Tab 4 just didn't have the right width or back material to make it a good fit for this sunshade, but the materials are excellent and the craftsmanship is outstanding. The seller did everything they could but I'll just have to wait till I get the right tablet (most likely an iPad Mini) to make it work.Their shipping is very quick and their customer service, as I already mentioned, is second to none. 5-stars for that alone.
customer_reviews.author: ksiads

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my galaxy tab S2 8
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my galaxy tab S2 8.0 tablet. One note: micro usb hole is offset, so I cut 1/4" longer excess hole to fit the tab S2's micro plug location. Not a big issue, in fact looks like it was factory made!! ha,ha. Mahalo for such a fine product. Great for the sunny weather we have here in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy design.  Poor mounting. Does not fit NVIDIA SHIELD K1 tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit NVIDIA SHIELD K1 tablet. Flimsy design. Poor mounting.
customer_reviews.author: justin g bonar

customer_reviews.title: Stable and secure
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade will NOT accept an 8 inch device as is. It must be slightly modified. The mod is a simple cut about 1/2" in two places on one end. Once done the monitor grip will actually grip the device and hold it while shading it from the sun. This is a very stable arrangement. Combined with a Alloy Tablet Monitor Mount Bracket Holder Adapter For DJI Phantom 4/3 Inspire 1 Transmitter Remote Controller the whole assembly is completely stable and secure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8" (T337A)
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but does not fit the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8" (T337A). It's just a little too small. I can get to fit but I have to bend the little flaps a little. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shade is exactly as it appears in the photo. It fits my iPad Mini 4 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Raab

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not able to judge this product. My mistake in ordering the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Quality look and finish. I have an iPad mini 4 with plastic case covering back and edges which makes the fit a bit tight, but still useable. Blocks out light very well. I bought this before even flying in bright sun because I know what that looks like on my cell phone. This should be added to some of those drone packs as standard equipment.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, cheap, the micro usb hole is in the wrong spot... but it does work...But so will a shoe box.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Kind of flimsy but I figured for the price, it would do what I wanted. It does shield the light. It fits my Samsung Tab2 without a problem. What I didn't like is the micro USB hole is no where near the opening on my Tab2. I had to use a razor and make the hole work. Also, the velcro strips are rather flimsy. All in all, it works, but don't expect longevity or a solid feel... and make sure you have a razor to fix the micro USB port cut out
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone flying in the daytime when it's sunny
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my iPad mini 2 and my Mavic Pro while using the SkyReat DJI Mavic Pro Aluminum-Alloy Foldable Mount. The shade works perfectly and fits well while using the SkyReat mount. Built well and I think it will last a while. It does the job of blocking out the sun with no issues. Would recommend to anyone flying in the daytime when it's sunny.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, able to fly my drone in the sun with no interference of the sun glare
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Clear Flying
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with being able to see my tablet while flying I finally found this and bought it. It fits perfectly on my LG tablet and makes a HUGE difference being able to see the screen to navigate, to take still and to shoot video. Love it and wish I'd picked it up sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my iPAD mini 4. I have heard some people say the suction cups don't hold, well just put a little saliva from your finger and they won't let go.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice extra long covers, worked like a charm, a baby can put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Max

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size for regular tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I think it was user error, but be careful to order the correct size...I needed the larger tablet. This is for the mini version.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Sun Block
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Samsug & IPAD 8" tablets. Great ease of use and quality for price. i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: truckerloyd

customer_reviews.title: a necessary item for the drone pilot.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use with my Phantom3 4k. Fits the controller and my Ipad4 mini Perfectly. Suction cups grab and hold for an added sense of security. I would recommend upgrading the tablet mount on your controller for a little extra stability. The weight of the sunshade makes the plastic original mount want to tip to the front a bit.
customer_reviews.author: TMartin

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the tablet that this sunshade is made for as it does not work on anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this item is made for only one product - and that product is NOT my tablet! If you do not have the product this item is made for, it just won't work!. (now I have two sunshades that are gathering dust)
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.......
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this. Very flimsy, Velcro on the sides won't stick and if even in the smallest breeze the sides flop around. Can't really say if it works or not because of the sides not sticking and not shielding my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Did not find the quality of this product very good. It does help with the sun a little
customer_reviews.text: Did not find the quality of this product very good. It does help with the sun a little, but not as much as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greatly improved ability to see mini tab in bright sun.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Doughty

customer_reviews.title: DJI Phantom 3 Pro controller sunshade
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and is very sturdy. iPad mini 2 fits in the sunshade nicely with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Fine sun screen.  Well worth price
customer_reviews.text: Fine sun screen. Light, easy to attach, well designed. Only wish they had more sizes available..
customer_reviews.author: H. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my iPad mini 4. A++
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my iPad mini 4. A++. Also the openings match up perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Allen N

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: does not fit all 8in tablet, only fits up to 8 inch physical size
customer_reviews.author: W. Mutter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy, easy to fold up. it blocks the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It says it fits on Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: It says it fits on Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 8.0, but it really doesn't. It is a hassle as it fits to small and the table pushes the velcro on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lugo

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this item at all
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this fits on my Tablet but doesn't do anything. I tried standing in all directions outside and don't work. Even under a tree didn't work. Sorry just can't recommend this to anyone. I used on apple tablet and android tablet. Others stating it works good They must be sitting inside of their car when using it. While flying drone World
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift or idea for any drone/hobbiest
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived appropriately packaged, on-time, and brand new as described on the website. If you have an older version IPad e.g. IPad two this will be too small if you also have the Apple case on the IPad. If you are using for an IPad for which you have a cover on it I would suggest buying:
customer_reviews.author: DMacNulty

customer_reviews.title: Designed for iPad mini - nothing else. Not very well designed or made.
customer_reviews.text: Specifically made for the iPad mini. I have a tab S2. Instructions say to "cut a hole" for the USB cable. One problem - there's a large Velcro strip in the way. Cutting that also cuts the thread holding the strip on. The back is also very "floppy" - when it's on the remote, the sides sag down almost 1/2" - the only thing stopping the sag is the USB connection - so most the weight of the shade is on the jack. Never a good idea. The construction is basically a thin vinyl coating on one side, flock on the other, and thin cardboard between those.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 2 days late, flimsy materials and does not fit K! tablet. The velcro aslo does not stick well
customer_reviews.author: Nick g

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didn't fit my tablet, my fault though didn't read too far into description.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Aranda

product_meta.title: Powerextra 8.0 Inches Tablet Monitor Sunshade Hood for DJI Mavic pro, Spark, Phantom 2/3 and Phantom 4/4 Pro Transmitters, Fit for iPad Mini 4/3/2, Samsung Galaxy 8.0 Tab S2/3, Nexus Tab 7/8
product_meta.description:
About Powerextra: 
Powerextra specializes in digital camera batteries, flight batteries, power tool batteries and photographic accessories on Amazon. We always try our best to provide customers with good-quality products, affordable prices, satisfying services and a happy shopping experience. 

Product Specification： 
Monitor sunshade hood (size): Length 23.0cm Width 14.0cm Height 18.0cm
Material: PC Leather 
Color: White & Black

Wide Compatibility 
These monitor sunshade hood are widely compatible with Phantom 3 professional, advanced, 4K, Inspire1/2 and 4/4 Pro remote controller 

Suitable for Tablet: 
ipad mini 4/3/2
Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8.0" SM-T715C, T710, T713, T719C
Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 7.0" T270
Google Nexus Tab 7 (7.0"), Tab 8 (8.0") 
Other brand Smart Tablet with a size smaller than 8.0" 

Reliable PC Leather Material 
Made of highly durable PC Leather, the sunshade hood has great durability and skid resitance. It’s well manufactured and designed to be lightweight, stable, comfortable in use.

User-friendly Monitor Hood 
The foldable and lightweight sunshade hood is very easy to use and convenient to store 

Package includes: 
1 x Remote Controller Monitor Hood
feature_bullets: NOTE: Can't fit for NVIDIA SHIELD K1. Perfectly fit for ipad mini 4/3/2, Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8.0" SM-T715C, T710, T713, T719C, Tab 4 7.0" T270, Google Nexus Tab 7 (7.0") /Tab 8 (8.0") and other brand Smart Tablet with a size smaller than 8.0", but can't fit tablet length more than 8.0 inch.

Suitable Quadcopter: DJI Mavic Pro, Phantom 2, 3 Advanced, Professional, 4K, Inspire 1 and Phantom 4, 4 Pro drones. Not fit for Phantom 3 standard drone. ( Only sunshade hood, not including Phantom drones remote controller)

Quick release, foldable and lightweight sunshade hood, convenient for storage, black lining protects your eyes from light reflection. Before installing, you'd better remove the external protective case of your tablet.
Quality Material: Made of premium soft synthetic leather, the monitor sunshade hood is highly durable and comfortable.
48 pcs anti-skid built-in fix type suckers enable cellphone to be easily installed and removed, and protect your smart tablet from dropped.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars110 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
